samples.name: Gantt Chart
samples.description: Displays a Gantt chart in combination with a tree table and a toolbar.

samples.name: Gantt Chart with JSON Binding
samples.description: Simple Gantt chart with JSON model binding.

samples.name: Gantt Chart with OData V2 Binding
samples.description: A new Gantt chart that can be implemented using OData V2 binding. The sample supports resizing, drag and drop, relationships management, export to excel and other actions.

samples.name: Gantt Chart with OData V4 Binding
samples.description: A new Gantt chart that can be implemented using OData V4 binding. The sample supports resizing, drag and drop, relationships management and other actions.

samples.name: Conditional Shape
samples.description: A simple Gantt chart with a conditional shape.

samples.name: Gantt Chart Container
samples.description: Displays complex Gantt charts in a container, which resembles SAP Transportation Management Planning. This sample supports drag and drop across the rows, switching layouts and hierarchy, and other actions.

samples.name: Shapes
samples.description: A Gantt chart with all standard shapes.

samples.name: Resize & Select
samples.description: This sample demonstrates selection and resizing.

samples.name: Sorting
samples.description: This sample shows how to sort shapes in a row.

samples.name: Calendar Definition
samples.description: This sample shows how to define custom calendar shapes.

samples.name: Full-Screen Zooming
samples.description: Shows how to define full-screen zooming strategy. Full-screen zooming always shows the total horizon.

samples.name: Proportional Zooming
samples.description: Shows how to define proportional zooming strategy. Proportional zooming allows the users to zoom in or out by switching between arbitrary zoom levels.

samples.name: Step-Wise Zooming
samples.description: This sample shows how to define step-wise zooming strategy. Step-wise zooming allows the users to zoom in or out by switching between predefined zoom levels.

samples.name: Legends
samples.description: This sample shows how to define legends in Gantt charts.

samples.name: Custom Shape Definition
samples.description: This sample shows how to define a custom shape.

samples.name: Gantt Chart PDF Export
samples.description: This sample shows export Gantt Chart to PDF

samples.name: Standard Shapes
samples.description: A library of Fiori compatible shapes for Gantt Chart.

samples.name: Gantt Chart with Adhoc Lines and Delta Lines
samples.description: A new Gantt chart with Adhoc Lines and Delta Lines.

samples.name: Selection of Predecessors and Successors
samples.description: A new Gantt chart showing the selection of predecessors and successors of the selected shape in a shape chain.

samples.name: Relationships
samples.description: This sample shows how to define Relationship's features in Gantt chart.

samples.name: Multiple dynamic Calendar
samples.description: This sample shows how to define Multiple Dynamic Calendars in Gantt chart.

samples.name: Timezone support in Gantt Chart
samples.description: This sample shows how timezone is supported in Gantt chart.

samples.name: Minute Timeline
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to configure Timeline options to display timelines at the seconds and milliseconds level in a Gantt Chart.

samples.name: Hide Non-Working Hours - Stepwise Zoom Strategy
samples.description: This sample shows how to hide non-working hours in a Gantt chart with the Stepwise Zoom Strategy.

samples.name: Hide Non-Working Hours - Proportion Zoom Strategy
samples.description: This sample shows how to hide non-working hours in a Gantt chart with the Proportion Zoom Strategy.

samples.name: Custom implementation of Skip Pattern provider - Date Range
samples.description: This sample shows how to implement custom skip pattern and discontinuity provider. It hides date ranges from the Gantt chart timeline.
